name: Magic Match vs. Troll Blitz Puzzle Battle
name_original: Magic Match vs. Troll Blitz Puzzle Battle
description:
The Troll Blitz must be stopped in this new addicting free MATCH-3 PUZZLE BATTLE game!

Pick up your magic crossbow and match gems to use the power of fire, light, shadow, poison, ice and lightning against waves and waves of Trolls! Call your friends for help or help them in their journey!

Feel overwhelmed by the enemy army? Turn the tides of battle using Magic Boosters! Create traps with the Magic Bomb, stop the Trolls on their tracks frosting them with Winter Freeze and annihilate entire enemy waves with the powerful Silver Arrow!

Engage in this epic adventure with your friends to save your village, the kingdom and the world! Play Magic Match vs. Troll Blitz right now!

Features:
• Easy to play!
• Top notch art!
• Gorgeous graphics!
• Highly addictive gameplay!
• Amazing audio!
• The best Puzzle Battle game on the App Store
• Play with your friends over Facebook!
• Lots of levels
• Free updates

Have fun!

Get it WHILE IT'S FREE!
